languages.text: "Он... сказал что-то про Теодору. Про то, что кровь в моих жилах приведет меня к служению Хаосу".

traits.locale_text: "Он... сказал что-то про Теодору. Про то, что кровь в моих жилах приведет меня к служению Хаосу".

languages.text: "He... said something about Theodora. About how the blood in my veins will lead me to serve Chaos."
languages.original_text: "Он... сказал что-то про Теодору. Про то, что кровь в моих жилах приведет меня к служению Хаосу".

traits.locale_text: "He... said something about Theodora. About how the blood in my veins will lead me to serving Chaos."
"He... said something about Theodora. About how the blood in my veins will lead me to serving Chaos."
"He... said something about Theodora. About how the blood in my veins will lead me to serving Chaos."

"He... said something about Theodora. About how the blood in my veins will lead me to serve Chaos."
"He... said something about Theodora. About how the blood in my veins will lead me to serve Chaos."

languages.text: «Ha... dicho algo sobre Theodora. Que la sangre de mis venas me llevará a servir al Caos».
languages.original_text: "He... said something about Theodora. About how the blood in my veins will lead me to serve Chaos."

traits.locale_text: «Ha... dicho algo sobre Theodora. Que la sangre de mis venas me llevará a servir al Caos».

languages.text: 「あいつは…シオドーラについて何か言っていた。{mf|俺|私}の中に流れる血が、{mf|俺|私}が渾沌に仕えるよう導くだろうと」
languages.original_text: "He... said something about Theodora. About how the blood in my veins will lead me to serve Chaos."

traits.locale_text: 「あいつは…シオドーラについて何か言っていた。{mf|俺|私}の中に流れる血が、{mf|俺|私}が渾沌に仕えるよう導くだろうと」

languages.text: “他……说了某些关于西奥多拉的事情。他说，我的血脉会引导我侍奉混沌。”
languages.original_text: "He... said something about Theodora. About how the blood in my veins will lead me to serve Chaos."

traits.locale_text: “他……说了某些关于西奥多拉的事情。他说，我的血脉会引导我侍奉混沌。”

languages.text: « Il... a dit quelque chose à propos de Théodora. Il a dit que le sang qui coule dans mes veines finira par me pousser inexorablement à servir le Chaos. »
languages.original_text: "He... said something about Theodora. About how the blood in my veins will lead me to serve Chaos."

traits.locale_text: « Il... a dit quelque chose à propos de Théodora. Il a dit que le sang qui coule dans mes veines finira par me pousser inexorablement à servir le Chaos. »

languages.text: "Er ... hat etwas über Theodora gesagt. Dass das Blut in meinen Venen dazu führen wird, dass ich dem Chaos diene."
languages.original_text: "He... said something about Theodora. About how the blood in my veins will lead me to serve Chaos."

traits.locale_text: "Er ... hat etwas über Theodora gesagt. Dass das Blut in meinen Venen dazu führen wird, dass ich dem Chaos diene."

languages.text: "Theodora'yla ilgili bir şeyler söyledi. Damarlarımdaki kan, Kaos'a hizmet etmemi istiyormuş."
languages.original_text: "He... said something about Theodora. About how the blood in my veins will lead me to serve Chaos."

traits.locale_text: “Theodora’yla ilgili bir şeyler söyledi. Damarlarımdaki kan, Kaos’a hizmet etmemi istiyormuş.”
